ConstructionSettings.name: construct.demolishabletimeseconds
ConstructionSettings.description: Controls the amount of time after a building block is built that it can be demolished for free. Time is measured in real-world seconds.

ConstructionSettings.name: construct.demolishhammer
ConstructionSettings.description: Toggles the Demolish ability for the Hammer, allowing it to immediately destroy any building block you own.

ConstructionSettings.name: construct.freeconstruction
ConstructionSettings.description: Toggles the ability to build structures without consuming resources. A Building Plan is still required by the player.

ConstructionSettings.name: construct.freeupgrading
ConstructionSettings.description: Toggles the ability to upgrade building blocks without consuming resources.

ConstructionSettings.name: construct.getbuildinginfo
ConstructionSettings.description: Prints the building information for the structure you’re looking at to the console log.

ConstructionSettings.name: construct.getvendingmachineinfo
ConstructionSettings.description: Prints the building information for the vending machine you’re looking at to the console log.

ConstructionSettings.name: construct.nukebuilding
ConstructionSettings.description: Obliterates the target building. Takes a Building ID, found by running the getbuildinginfo command or Ent info command when looking at the building.

ConstructionSettings.name: entity.deleteby
ConstructionSettings.description: Obliterates all buildings created by the player named in the command.

ConstructionSettings.name: ent destroybuilding
ConstructionSettings.description: Obliterates the building you are looking at.
